thread.title_full: This Unseen 'Dirty Dancing' Footage Will Make You Fall In Love With Patrick Swayze & Jennifer Grey All Over Again - Indiatimes.com

title: This Unseen 'Dirty Dancing' Footage Will Make You Fall In Love With Patrick Swayze & Jennifer Grey All Over Again - Indiatimes.com
text:
Tanya Sirohi February 07, 2017 A never-before-seen video featuring our favourite Hollywood pair from the '80s is definite proof of Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey's undeniable chemistry, both onscreen and off it. 
Screen grab 
The featurette, reportedly included in Dirty Dancing 's 30th Anniversary Blu-ray, shows the young actors breaking into some of the iconic dance moves from the equally iconic movie. 
The clip, first featured on Yahoo , also points to director Emile Ardolino's keen eye and creative genius in casting the electric pair. 
If for nothing else but to relive the moment of cinematic brilliance we experienced when the beloved pair was first introduced, watch the video! Don't Miss
